title: foundry similiar to letterbox
content:
Can anyone suggest a foundry that has stylized fonts similar to Letterbox? The fonts don’t necessarily have to be similar to Letterbox’s, just that they are stylized and unique. thanks.

 [‹ Type SQL](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907170334/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45166 "Go to previous forum topic") [Where does the term "The Black Art" come from? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907170334/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33384 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jasonf

comments.content: Are you talking about Stephen Banham’s Letterbox in Australia?
